title: Fragments, mid–late 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed and painted on plain weave (black outline printed; reds, purples and blues filled in by brush; chintz)
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 55 x 41 cm (21 5/8 x 16 1/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 20 x 7 cm (7 7/8 x 2 3/4 in.)
description: Ornate diagonal grid in blue containing floral motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, mid–late 18th century.
mid–late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed and painted on plain weave (black outline printed; reds, purples and blues filled in by brush; chintz). Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-29-a,b.
